channel.title: Walking Updating Glitch
channel.description:
Well, for example...
Someone is fighting in the fight pits. They die and teleport back to the viewing area. But if anyone else is around, the person's position never updates and they see them noclipping, even if they aren't.
Base: Allstar (Don't even start with that)
Wondering if there's some code I can add somewhere to fix this. Really getting in the way.
